button.example:
import { Button } from './components/ui/button';

// Variants
<Button variant="primary" text="Primary" />
<Button variant="secondary" text="Secondary" />
<Button variant="outline" text="Outline" />
<Button variant="ghost" text="Ghost" />
<Button variant="destructive" text="Destructive" />

// Sizes
<Button size="sm" text="Small" />
<Button size="base" text="Base" />
<Button size="lg" text="Large" />

// States
<Button loading={true} text="Loading..." />
<Button disabled={true} text="Disabled" />

// Custom onPress
<Button 
  text="Click me" 
  onPress={() => console.log('Button pressed!')} 
/>

// With icon (if icon component is available)
<Button 
  text="With Icon" 
  leftIcon="check" 
  variant="primary" 
/>

dialog.example:
import { Dialog, Button, Text } from './components/ui';
import { useState } from 'react';

function Example() {
  const [open, setOpen] = useState(false);

  return (
    <Dialog.Root open={open} onOpenChange={setOpen}>
      <Dialog.Trigger asChild>
        <Button text="Open Dialog" />
      </Dialog.Trigger>
      <Dialog.Content>
        <Dialog.Header>
          <Dialog.Title>Dialog Title</Dialog.Title>
          <Dialog.Description>
            Optional description text here
          </Dialog.Description>
        </Dialog.Header>
        <Text>Dialog content goes here...</Text>
        <Dialog.Footer>
          <Dialog.Close asChild>
            <Button variant="outline" text="Cancel" />
          </Dialog.Close>
          <Button text="Confirm" onPress={() => console.log('Confirmed')} />
        </Dialog.Footer>
      </Dialog.Content>
    </Dialog.Root>
  );
}

// Size variants:
<Dialog.Root size="sm">
<Dialog.Root size="base">
<Dialog.Root size="lg">
<Dialog.Root size="xl">

// With close button:
<Dialog.Content showCloseButton>

// Custom trigger:
<Dialog.Trigger asChild>
  <Pressable style={customStyle}>
    <Text>Custom Trigger</Text>
  </Pressable>
</Dialog.Trigger>

api.description: A compound dialog component built on Modal with header, content, and footer sections. Supports the asChild pattern for custom triggers.

props.name: onOpenChange
props.description: Callback when dialog open state changes

props.name: showCloseButton
props.description: Whether to show close button in header

import { Surface } from './components/ui/surface';

  <Text>Default surface</Text>
</Surface>

</Surface>

  <Text>Muted surface</Text>
</Surface>

// Elevation levels

<Surface elevation="sm">Small shadow</Surface>
<Surface elevation="md">Medium shadow</Surface>
<Surface elevation="lg">Large shadow</Surface>
<Surface elevation="xl">Extra large shadow</Surface>

// Border radius

<Surface radius="sm">Small radius</Surface>
<Surface radius="md">Medium radius</Surface>
<Surface radius="lg">Large radius</Surface>
<Surface radius="full">Fully rounded</Surface>

<Surface padding="sm">Small padding</Surface>
<Surface padding="md">Medium padding</Surface>

  radius="lg" 
  padding="lg"
